attributes.action: Pass a law stating cosmetic products mustn’t have sharp corners & must be round
attributes.background: Injuries are repeatedly sustained from the pointed corners of cosmetics bottles, these corners are resulting in cuts and abrasions for many and could be fatal to infants. I want to put a stop to this!! Making the corners of cosmetic products rounded would stop this and make them generally safer.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what products you'd like this to apply to. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
